atributes.sql:
SELECT 'ALL','All Websites' FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT store_id,code FROM @core_store

title: Quotes list
report_sql:
SELECT A.store_id,
      DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as `Created date`,
	  DATE_FORMAT(A.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as `Updated date`,
      CONCAT(ROUND(A.base_subtotal*A.base_to_global_rate,2),' ',A.global_currency_code) as base_subtotal,
      CONCAT(ROUND(((A.base_subtotal*A.base_to_global_rate)- (A.base_subtotal_with_discount*A.base_to_global_rate)),2),' ',A.global_currency_code) as `base discount`,
      CONCAT(ROUND(A.base_grand_total*A.base_to_global_rate,2),' ',A.global_currency_code) as base_grand_total,
      A.customer_id,
      A.customer_email,
      A.customer_firstname,
      A.customer_middlename,
      A.customer_lastname,
      A.coupon_code
FROM @sales_flat_quote A
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN :STARTDATE AND :ENDDATE
AND (':STORE_ID'='ALL' OR A.store_id=':STORE_ID')
ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC
